Posts.Content: On 11/24/2008 ShirleyM wrote: Yes I know what you are feeling! Almost everyone goes through being sad and angry! I also had breast Cancer and had my left breast removed. I didn't have reconstruction b/c I had read how much trouble some have with the implants. BUT we as human beings do not understand that we can not make things right with ourselves or anyone else! We have to talk to our creator and ask him what lesson can I learn from this? Turn this over to God and ask him to see you through, that's what I did. I was allergic to all the pain killing drugs and had hives all over me from the Morphine! I said Lord you have to ease my pain b/c I can't take the drugs to numb me. Guess what---I had NO PAIN  at all and that is almost unheard of,after a mastectomy.YOU see our trouble is trying to fix it ourself and we can't,so now we have to turn it over to God and TRUST him to fix our MIND,BODY and SOUL. And he will!!! Dr's and nurses are just helping God out by taking care of his children,BUT the real healing take place under God wonderful hands,that he gives so freely to us.All that he ask in return is our faith and trust in him. No bills in the mail ,just your love for him! I will pray for you and ask God to comfort you and see you through it all. Hugs Shirley thank you so much. this reall help me alot. for god is whit us all if we only let him in our heart's and ask him to help us. thank you so so much.
Posts.Title: I am about to give up.

Posts.Content: I have a Lump in my right Breast and I Have Pain And Burning in it all the time.I am 45 year old. and I had this lump send 2007 but now it got biger.they want'ed to take it out.but now they chang there mind.I ask them what was the lump. but they could'nt till me for they was not sure what it is. so they told me to just come back next year for they nothing they can do for me. But I know in my Heart they got to be somthing a m.d. could do for me But I just Don't know what. for if it breast cancer I"LL like to know. so I call cancer treatment centerset america and they told me to go to aother m.d. and talk to them about it. see what they can do for me. so I am going to try one more time. and if that m.d can't help me I am just giveing up. for my love one's don't want me to talk to them about it anymore for they say they geting sick of talking about it. and geting sick of takeing me to see the m.d. about my breast but they don't unstand I am worry. for they Don't unstand I am sick of hurting . so now I don't say anything about it to them anymore. and when I go to hurting I just don't let them know for I just go on like nothing a wong whit me.

Thank youplease,please do not give up! first of all God is on your side alwayys there for you. we are here for you, we all stand together here so feel free to lean on us. i wll keep you in my prayers. by all means get a second opinion and let me know how you made out. may God bless!  God love you and so do i
Posts.Title: I am about to give up.

Posts.Content: I'm not for sure if I have Breast Cancer. but I'll know more about it Monday. I been Looking at the signs and symptoms on breast cancer.and it didn't till me all that much on it. I like to know if anyone had or have Symptoms of there Breast hurting so bad that it make you sick some time?                                       Thank You so much For -Your Help.
Posts.Title: I need Help.

Posts.Content: On 2/24/2008 gertie wrote: Before I was diagnosed, I had pain and a burning sensation around my nipple.  I have a fairly large tumor now, but, it started out small only two months ago.  In the beginning, any pressure applied to the breast was painful and stinging.  Up until I was diagnosed, we still had hope that it was a cyst.  Keep up the hope that you may not have Breast Cancer! I'm still haveing pain and burning in my Breast on the right of my breast. I'll am 45 year old. and I when to the Dr every since last year off and on. for they find somthings in my Breast. But they don't know What it is. and  it get biger every time they look at it. they was going to take it out But they chang there mind. and they told me to come back  next year. for they can't help me. but they said they can't till me what they find in my Breast. and they don't know way it hurting me but they said they nothing they can do for me. I had a Aunt had Breast Cancer on my Mother sida But The Dr said that don't meand anything. so now I don't know what to do anymore. I Reall Like To Know What I Could Do To Help MySelf to Find Out What Going On Whit My Breast. For They Can't Tell Me If It Breast Cancer Or Not. For That What The Dr Told Me.I
Posts.Title: I need Help.

Posts.Content: I going see a surgery on 2/18/2008 to see when he going to do a biopsy on me.  And I really don't know have that will go off.
Posts.Title: May Have Breast Cancer
